fees_no, adjust_qty, adjust_box, adjust_weight, last_modifier_id, last_modifier, last_modify_time, del_flag, is_calculated, calculate_time, remark, instock_no, external_num, warehouse_code, warehouse_name, customer_id, customer_name, instock_type, total_qty, total_box, total_weight, receiver, creator, create_time, write_time
mapper.update:
update biz_instock_info
adjust_qty = #{adjustQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, adjust_box = #{adjustBox,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, adjust_weight = #{adjustWeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_modifier_id = #{lastModifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_modifier = #{lastModifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id}

update biz_instock_info
adjust_qty = #{adjustQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, adjust_box = #{adjustBox,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, adjust_weight = #{adjustWeight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
last_modifier_id = #{lastModifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_modifier = #{lastModifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_calculated = #{isCal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where instock_no=#{instockNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
